Class BaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.api.services.BaseService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionService, ActiveWidgetLayoutService, AlertDefinitionService, AlertGroupService, AlertHistoryService, AlertNoticeService, AlertService, AlertTargetService, BlueprintService, ClusterKerberosDescriptorService, ClusterService, ClusterStackVersionService, CompatibleRepositoryVersionService, ComponentService, ConfigGroupService, ConfigurationService, CredentialService, ExtensionLinksService, ExtensionsService, FeedService, GroupPrivilegeService, GroupService, HostComponentService, HostKerberosIdentityService, HostService, HostStackVersionService, InstanceService, JobService, KerberosDescriptorService, LdapSyncEventService, LoggingService, MemberService, MpacksService, OperatingSystemService, PermissionService, PreUpgradeCheckService, PrivilegeService, RecommendationService, RemoteClustersService, RepositoryService, RepositoryVersionService, RequestScheduleService, RequestService, RoleAuthorizationService, RootServiceComponentConfigurationService, RootServiceService, ServiceConfigVersionService, ServiceService, SettingService, StackAdvisorCommand, StacksService, StageService, TargetClusterService, TaskAttemptService, TaskService, UpgradeGroupService, UpgradeItemService, UpgradeService, UpgradeSummaryService, UserAuthenticationSourceService, UserAuthorizationService, UserPrivilegeService, UserService, ValidationService, VersionDefinitionService, ViewDataMigrationService, ViewExternalSubResourceService, ViewInstanceService, ViewPermissionService, ViewPrivilegeService, ViewService, ViewSubResourceService, ViewUrlsService, ViewVersionService, WidgetLayoutService, WidgetService, WorkflowService

    public abstract class BaseService
extends Object
    Provides common functionality to all services.

      • init

        public static void init(RequestAuditLogger instance)

      • handleRequest

        protected javax.ws.rs.core.Response handleRequest(javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers,
                                                  String body,
                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                                  Request.Type requestType,
                                                  ResourceInstance resource)
        Requests are funneled through this method so that common logic can be executed. Creates a request instance and invokes it's process method. Uses the default media type.
        Parameters:
        headers - http headers
        body - http body
        uriInfo - uri information
        requestType - http request type
        resource - resource instance that is being acted on
        Returns:
        the response of the operation in serialized form

      • handleRequest

        protected javax.ws.rs.core.Response handleRequest(javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers,
                                                  String body,
                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                                  Request.Type requestType,
                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                                  ResourceInstance resource)
        Requests are funneled through this method so that common logic can be executed. Creates a request instance and invokes it's process method.
        Parameters:
        headers - http headers
        body - http body
        uriInfo - uri information
        requestType - http request type
        mediaType - the requested media type; may be null
        resource - resource instance that is being acted on
        Returns:
        the response of the operation in serialized form

      • createResource

        protected ResourceInstance createResource(Resource.Type type,
                                          Map<Resource.Type,String> mapIds)
        Create a resource instance.
        Parameters:
        type - the resource type
        mapIds - all primary and foreign key properties and values
        Returns:
        a newly created resource instance

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the result serializer
